verses.name: Psalms 135:12
verses.text: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.

verses.name: Psalms 135:13
verses.text: Thy name, O Lord, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O Lord, throughout all generations.

verses.name: Psalms 135:14
verses.text: For the Lord will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.

verses.name: Psalms 135:15
verses.text: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.

verses.name: Psalms 135:16
verses.text: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;

verses.name: Psalms 135:17
verses.text: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
